scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:ts && bun run build:copy
scripts.build:copy: cp index.html dist/ && cp -r src/styles.css dist/ && cp -r node_modules dist/ && sed -i '' 's|/src/main.ts|/main.js|g' dist/index.html
scripts.deploy: bun run build && echo 'Ready for deployment to GitHub Pages'
